categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The giant walking fish was a large, monstrous fish. It was shaped like a lizard, covered in brown scales impervious to blaster fire, and had fins, underdeveloped foreclaws, and spiny teeth. Giant walking fish liked to eat glowworms.
Hobbrock was a domesticated walking fish that lived in boiling, sulfurous water in the Coruscant underworld.
